request.description: Run complete fraud detection (Identity + Financial + Employment + Cross-Verification) for applicant ID 1. Returns combined fraud score from all 42+ rules (14 Identity + 11 Financial + 7 Employment + 10 Cross-Verification categories), risk level, and all triggered rules.
Run only identity fraud detection (14 rules). Checks: Duplicate Aadhaar/PAN, DOB mismatch, Name mismatch, Document tampering, etc.
Run only financial fraud detection (11 rules). Checks: Loan-to-Income ratio, Debt-to-Income ratio, Salary mismatch, Credit utilization, Multiple loans, etc.
Run only employment fraud detection (7 rules). Checks: Fake employer, Ghost company, Payslip forgery, Employment duration mismatch, Unverifiable self-employed, etc.
Run only cross-verification fraud detection (10 rule categories). Checks: Name/DOB/Address/Income/Employment/Banking/Loan/Property/Gold/Behavioral consistency across all documents and sources.
